entry.title: Tite-dri - 4"x 7" Absorbent Meat, Fish & Poultry Pad 50 Grams - 2000/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tite-Dri
Type: Disposables
Price: 59.99

Tite-dri - AC-50 - 4"x7" Absorbent Meat, Fish & Poultry Pad 50 Grams - 2000/Case

These white 4" x 7" absorbent meat, fish, and poultry pads will improve the appearance and shelf life of prepackaged meats at your deli counter or butcher shop by absorbing excess juices. By improving the appearance of your prepackaged meat products with these absorbent food pads, you'll attract more impulse purchases!

Each absorbent pad features virgin cellulose fibers for maximum absorbency, wrapped and sealed on all four sides by a polyethylene film, with perforations on one side. These 4" x 7" white absorbent meat soaker pads have a 50 gram liquid absorption capacity and comply with USDA and FDA requirements.

entry.title: Dyne-A-Pak - #12S White Foam Meat Tray 11” x 9” x 0.625” - 250/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dyne-A-Pak
Type: Disposables
Price: 29.99

Product Details:

Display your freshest meats, fruits, and vegetables with this foam tray! Made of sturdy, high-quality foam, this supermarket tray is perfect for arranging produce, poultry, and more to be stored or displayed in refrigerated merchandisers at your establishment. The tray's black color draws attention to the products featured inside, and can even be used for simple product identification. Whatever you use it for, this tray is a versatile option for delis, grocery stores, and similar venues.

Compatible with auto wrapping equipment, this foam tray makes packaging meats and produce easy and efficient, helping to save time and energy. Plus, when packaged, this tray is the perfect way to keep food items fresh for longer periods of time. As an added benefit, this tray is disposable, providing customers with fast and easy clean up after use! Offering sturdiness and function at an economical price, this foam supermarket tray is sure to suit your many needs.

Overall Dimensions:
11” x 9” x 0.625”

entry.title: Norstar - 14" x 18" OD - Vacuum Bags 4 MIL Clear - 500 / Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Norstar
Type: Disposables
Price: 136.99

Norstar - 14" x 18" OD - Vacuum Bags 4 MIL Clear - 500 / Case

Preserve and extend your food's shelf life with these  chamber vacuum packaging bags!

Great for a variety of applications, vacuum packaging pouches help extend the life of product while also preparing product for sous vide cooking. These particular bags are perfect for use with any chamber vacuum packaging machine, and each bag features an open end for inserting food, whether solid or liquid. Designed for industrial use, the bags are thick and resist punctures and abrasions to reliably preserve product.

Extends Life of Product

These industrial strength bags will help keep your food fresh up to five times longer than traditional storage methods, making it an extremely cost-effective alternative. This is great for planning specialty menus ahead of time or for using just a small amount of product and saving the rest for later.

Great Versatility

Securely sealing any solid or liquid product with a chamber vacuum packaging machine, this bag is designed to be frozen, refrigerated, or microwaved. Plus, it can withstand being boiled for up to minutes, allowing you to use it to cook directly in water. The heat resistance of the bag makes it great for sous vide cooking as well as for storage applications.

entry.title: SmartChoice - 4R Polished Cotton Twine - 1 Roll x 281'
entry.summary:
Vendor: SmartChoice
Type: Disposables
Price: 9.99

SmartChoice - 4R Polished Cotton Butcher Twine - 1 Roll x 281'

Polished cotton primarily used for wrapping and packaging or tying meats and poultry in the food service industry.

This high quality, professional sausage twine is made of a strong poly/cotton fiber, which is the perfect heavy twine for a variety of kitchen tasks. This spool of twine is sold like there is ample twine to create many savory dishes.

Use this twine to tie back and truss chicken and turkey legs when roasting, (which helps the meat to cook evenly and stay in place), tie bundles of herbs, hang meat to dry, tie up roasts, or keep pork, beef, fish and other meats fresh with butcher paper.

entry.title: Selectum - Desktop Tape Dispenser Heavy Duty - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Selectum
Type: Disposables
Price: 4.99

Easily dispense tape with this Desktop Tape Dispenser Heavy Duty!

Ideal for the office, kitchen, or other business area, this masking tape dispenser is designed for easy, efficient dispensing. Not only does is boast a razor sharp cutting blade, but its weighted base helps hold it in place as you retrieve tape. Masking tape (sold separately) is perfect for holding food bags closed or for keeping sandwiches neatly wrapped in food service applications. However it's used, this dispenser is the most convenient way to cut off just the right piece of tape for the job!

Sharp Cutting Blade

This dispenser features a sharp cutting blade to ensure that tape is quickly and evenly cut from its roll. Just pull the tape from the roll and over the blade, yanking down. The blade will cut the tape with ease for efficient dispensing!
